metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4380 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.18.5, and 1.19.x before 1.19.2 allows remote attackersto bypass GlobalBlocking extension IP address blocking and create anaccount via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.14+dfsg-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.14+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.14+dfsg-1').
